QuestData.Title: The Hammer of Khaz'goroth
QuestData.Description: <Now that you have defeated Dargrul the Underking and have the Hammer of Khaz'goroth in hand, it is time to place it in Aegwynn's Gallery in the lower chambers of Dalaran.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the central teleporter in Dalaran and then place the Hammer of Khaz'goroth in Aegwynn's Gallery.
QuestData.RewardText: <Archmage Khadgar has set aside a space here for the Hammer of Khaz'goroth, as well as the rest of the Pillars of Creation.>
